title: Workshop on Developing English Teaching Materials and Training Teachers Using Graphic Oral History Resources

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English teaching proficiency and elementary education experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-based constrained technology environments, addressing insufficient experience with graphic oral history materials on scientific topics

learning_goals: Participants design an English textbook based on graphic oral history materials in science topics by applying ELT (English Language Teaching) textbook development principles.
Participants execute the process of transforming oral history interview materials into graphic novel-style instructional materials through group collaboration.
Participants establish a plan for prototyping and revising the developed textbook using smartphone-based tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
